dc:title: Spainhousing.eu data table
dc:description: All data refers to Spain if not otherwise specified. This table summarizes and describes each of the columns/indicators of the database
dc:creator: https://github.com/galetaire

columns.title: Year
columns.dc:description: The year to which the data is referred to. In source formulas it is referenced as (n)

columns.title: Total_population
columns.dc:description: Total number of inhabitants

columns.title: Population_25_50
columns.dc:description: Total number of inhabitants between 25 and 50 years old

columns.title: Population_25_60
columns.dc:description: Total number of inhabitants between 25 and 60 years old

columns.title: Population_over18
columns.dc:description: Total number of inhabitants over 18 years old

columns.title: Upper_limit
columns.dc:description: Maximum number of unpaired inhabitants per year. The Population_25_50 column divided by 26

columns.title: Lower_limit
columns.dc:description: Maximum number of couples per year. The Upper_limit column divided by 2

columns.title: Optimal
columns.dc:description: The midpoint between the Upper and Lower limit. The Lower_limit column times 1,5

columns.title: Age_30
columns.dc:description: Total number of inhabitants aged 30 years old

columns.title: Age_30halved
columns.dc:description: Total number of inhabitants aged 30 years old, divided by 2

columns.title: Age_40
columns.dc:description: Total number of inhabitants aged 40 years old

columns.title: Age_40halved
columns.dc:description: Total number of inhabitants aged 40 years old, divided by 2

columns.title: Age_50
columns.dc:description: Total number of inhabitants aged 50 years old

columns.title: Age_50halved
columns.dc:description: Total number of inhabitants aged 50 years old, divided by 2

columns.title: Home_sales
columns.dc:description: Total number of house sales

columns.title: Inheritances
columns.dc:description: Total number of house inheritances

columns.title: Donations
columns.dc:description: Total number of house donations

columns.title: Swaps
columns.dc:description: Total number of house swaps

columns.title: Others
columns.dc:description: Other type of house acquisitions, such as land concentration, horizontal divisions, joint operations, operations that mix several types of acquisition, etc.

columns.title: Approved
columns.dc:description: Total number of approved mortgages on houses. Law does mandate to communicate mortgage approvals

columns.title: Releases
columns.dc:description: Total number of released mortgages on houses. Law does NOT mandate to communicate mortgage releases

columns.title: Total_amount
columns.dc:description: Total amount of money, in euros, borrowed for home mortgages

columns.title: Average_amount
columns.dc:description: Average amount of money, in euros, borrowed for home mortgages

columns.title: Creditor_subrogation
columns.dc:description: Total number of creditor subrogations

columns.title: Consumer_subrogation
columns.dc:description: Total number of consumer subrogations

columns.title: Ratio_subrogations
columns.dc:description: Ratio between creditor subrogations and consumer subrogation

columns.title: Ratio_mortgages_sales
columns.dc:description: Ratio between approved mortgages on houses and total house sales

columns.title: Loan_to_value
columns.dc:description: Ratio between the average mortgage amount and the average value of an average size house

columns.title: Real_credit_movement
columns.dc:description: Percentage change in the total amount of borrowed money year-on-year, minus inflation year-on-year

columns.title: Average_mortgage_rate
columns.dc:description: Average interest rate for the approved mortgages on houses. Considers both fixed and variable mortgages

columns.title: Fixed_mortgages
columns.dc:description: Percentage of mortgages approved on houses with fixed interest rate

columns.title: Variable_mortgages
columns.dc:description: Percentage of mortgages approved on houses with variable interest rate

columns.title: Years_mortgage
columns.dc:description: Average term, in years, for approved mortgages on houses

columns.title: Euribor_1year
columns.dc:description: Annual average of the Euribor, considering the monthly average

columns.title: EURUSD_year_ave
columns.dc:description: Yearly average exchange rate Euro/USdollar

columns.title: EUR_house
columns.dc:description: Cost of a 100m2 house in euros

columns.title: USD_house
columns.dc:description: Cost of a 100m2 house in US dollars

columns.title: Euro_M3
columns.dc:description: European Central Bank, Monetary aggregate M3, Annual Frequency, in euros

columns.title: Euro_M3_stock_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage change in the euro M3 year-on-year

columns.title: BTCEUR_year_ave
columns.dc:description: Yearly average exchange rate Bitcoin/Euro

columns.title: BTC_house
columns.dc:description: Cost of a 100m2 house in bitcoins

columns.title: AUEUR_year_ave
columns.dc:description: Yearly average exchange rate Gold(ounce)/Euro

columns.title: Gold_house
columns.dc:description: Cost of a 100m2 house in ounces of gold

columns.title: GDP_eurozone
columns.dc:description: GDP annual growth from the Euro area, in percentage

columns.title: Household_net_income
columns.dc:description: Households net disposable income

columns.title: Disposable_income_over18
columns.dc:description: Average disposable income for population over 18 years old

columns.title: Income_constant_inflation
columns.dc:description: Disposable income if it grew at inflation levels

columns.title: Income_constant_mortgage
columns.dc:description: Disposable income if it grew at mortgage rate levels

columns.title: Income_constant_housing
columns.dc:description: Disposable income if it grew at housing price levels

columns.title: Income_vs_livingstandard
columns.dc:description: Income growth against housing and inflation growth

columns.title: Housing_affordability
columns.dc:description: Housing affordability index, Base 100 = 1999

columns.title: Wage_norm_IPVVR
columns.dc:description: Wage index, Base 51 = 1999, is Base 51 to match the Price_IPVVR of 1999

columns.title: Dif_Wage__IPVVR
columns.dc:description: Value difference between the Wage index and the IPVVR

columns.title: Ideal_wage
columns.dc:description: Wage required to completely pay off the mortgage with 5 years of full wage

columns.title: W_M_disconnect
columns.dc:description: Wage disconnection, in percentage

columns.title: Price_urban_land
columns.dc:description: Price of urban land

columns.title: Tx_land
columns.dc:description: Number of transactions involving urban land

columns.title: tx_juridicas_m2
columns.dc:description: Number of square meters transacted by legal entities involving urban land

columns.title: Tx_fisica_m2
columns.dc:description: Number of square meters transacted by physical people involving urban land

columns.title: Free_urbanland_km2
columns.dc:description: Amount of free urban land in km2

columns.title: Urbanland_km2
columns.dc:description: Amount of urban land in km2, free or not

columns.title: Land_velocity_years
columns.dc:description: Number of transactions involving urban land

columns.title: House_velocity_years
columns.dc:description: Number of transactions involving urban land

columns.title: Building_permits
columns.dc:description: Number of building permits

columns.title: Build
columns.dc:description: Number of permits requested for new buildings

columns.title: Reform
columns.dc:description: Number of permits requested for reforms

columns.title: Demolish
columns.dc:description: Number of permits requested for demolishing

columns.title: Permits_legalentity
columns.dc:description: Number of permits requested by legal entities

columns.title: Permits_individuals
columns.dc:description: Number of permits requested by individuals

columns.title: Permits_publicadmin
columns.dc:description: Number of permits requested by public entities

columns.title: Single_family
columns.dc:description: Number of permits requested to build single family units

columns.title: Single_family_m2
columns.dc:description: Average size, in m2, of single family units

columns.title: SF_cost
columns.dc:description: Amount of money, in euros, spend to build all the requested single family units

columns.title: SF_cost_ave
columns.dc:description: Average cost for building a single family unit

columns.title: SF_cost_m2
columns.dc:description: Average cost, per m2, of building a single family unit

columns.title: Condominiums
columns.dc:description: Number of permits requested to build condominiums units

columns.title: Condos_m2
columns.dc:description: Average size, in m2, of condominiums units

columns.title: Condos_cost
columns.dc:description: Amount of money, in euros, spend to build all the requested condominiums units

columns.title: Condos_cost_ave
columns.dc:description: Average cost for building a condominium unit

columns.title: Condos_cost_m2
columns.dc:description: Average cost, per m2, of building a condominium unit

columns.title: Ratio_price_cost
columns.dc:description: Ratio between the average housing price and the average construction cost

columns.title: Cost_edification
columns.dc:description: Índice de costes del sector de la construcción (Base Enero 2015=100)

columns.title: Total_homes
columns.dc:description: Total de viviendas por comunidades autónomas y provincias

columns.title: New_homes
columns.dc:description: Total of new homes build per year

columns.title: Private_housing
columns.dc:description: Total number of private homes build per year

columns.title: Public_housing
columns.dc:description: Total number of public homes build per year

columns.title: Private_housing_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage of private housing build per year

columns.title: Public_housing_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage of public housing build per year

columns.title: Inhabitants_per_home
columns.dc:description: Total inhabitants per home

columns.title: Average_people_home
columns.dc:description: Average number of people per home

columns.title: Dif_IH_AH
columns.dc:description: Total inhabitants per home

columns.title: Per_new_homes
columns.dc:description: Percentage change of homes year-on-year

columns.title: Pop_abs_yoy
columns.dc:description: Change of population year-on-year

columns.title: Population_yoy
columns.dc:description: Percentage change of population year-on-year

columns.title: Balance
columns.dc:description: Housing balance

columns.title: Employed_constr
columns.dc:description: Total employees in the construction sector

columns.title: Workers_per_home
columns.dc:description: Number of workers per housing unit built

columns.title: Workers_per_100_inhab
columns.dc:description: Number of workers per 100 inhabitants

columns.title: Cement_mt
columns.dc:description: Apparent cement consumption

columns.title: Legal_entity
columns.dc:description: Home sales and purchases by legal entities

columns.title: Nationals
columns.dc:description: Home sales and purchases by national population (with spanish nationality)

columns.title: Foreigners
columns.dc:description: Home sales and purchases by foreign population, adjusted

columns.title: Foreigner_raw
columns.dc:description: Home sales and purchases by foreign population

columns.title: Owned
columns.dc:description: Number of houses fully owned, without active mortgage

columns.title: Mortgaged
columns.dc:description: Number of houses with active mortgage

columns.title: Rented
columns.dc:description: Number of houses rented

columns.title: Freely_loaned
columns.dc:description: Number of houses freely loaned

columns.title: Owned_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage of owned houses

columns.title: Mortgaged_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage of mortgaged houses

columns.title: Rented_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage of rented houses

columns.title: Freely_loaned_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage of freely loaned houses

columns.title: Rent_price_IPVA
columns.dc:description: Price of renting a house according to INE, base 100 2015

columns.title: Idealista_rent_100
columns.dc:description: Price of renting a house according to idealista, base 100 2015

columns.title: Rent_price_eum2
columns.dc:description: Price of renting a house per m2 according to idealista

columns.title: Price_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage change of price rent year-on-year, Idealista

columns.title: Rent_ROI_gross
columns.dc:description: Number of years to fully recover a home purchase, gross value, Idealista

columns.title: Rent_ROI_gross_per
columns.dc:description: Housing gross rental return, in percentage, Idealista

columns.title: Rent_ROI_net
columns.dc:description: Number of years to fully recover a home purchase, net value, Idealista

columns.title: Rent_ROI_net_per
columns.dc:description: Housing net rental return, in percentage, Idealista

columns.title: Ratio_idealista
columns.dc:description: Ratio, in percentage, between Idealista price rent and house price

columns.title: Idealista_price
columns.dc:description: Price of buying a house per m2, according to Idealista.com

columns.title: Idealista_house_100
columns.dc:description: Price of a house according to idealista, base 100 2015

columns.title: Idealista_rent_100m
columns.dc:description: Price of renting a house of 100 square meters, Idealista

columns.title: Price_eum2
columns.dc:description: Price (nominal) of buying a house per m2, according to spanish notaries

columns.title: Price_IPVVR
columns.dc:description: The index price based on the repeat-sales pricing technique, known as Case-Shiller Index

columns.title: Price_IPV
columns.dc:description: The index price by INE, base 100 2015

columns.title: Inflation_CPI
columns.dc:description: Average inflation (CPI) by year

columns.title: CPI_1985
columns.dc:description: Average inflation by year, Base 1985=100

columns.title: Overrated_inflation
columns.dc:description: Accumulate of overrated inflation

columns.title: Real_price_over
columns.dc:description: Real value overrated, it discounts the amount of inflation rate on a yearly basis, generating a compound that overrates inflation

columns.title: Real_price
columns.dc:description: Real value price

columns.title: Accum_Inflation
columns.dc:description: Accumulated inflation

columns.title: IR_yoy_per
columns.dc:description: Difference of the euribor year-on-year

columns.title: Nominal_price_yoy_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage change of nominal price year-on-year

columns.title: Real_price_yoy_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage change of real price year-on-year

columns.title: Sales_yoy_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage change of sales year-on-year

columns.title: Credit_yoy_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage change of mortgages approvals year-on-year

columns.title: Unemployment_yoy_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage of unemployment

columns.title: Net_ROI_yoy_per
columns.dc:description: Housing return on investment, in percentage, considers both gross asset appreciation and net rental return

columns.title: Rainbow_curve
columns.dc:description: Rainbow curve, derived from the demographic curve. Visit blog post for more info

columns.title: RC_plus50
columns.dc:description: Rainbow curve plus 50 units

columns.title: RC_minus50
columns.dc:description: Rainbow curve minus 50 units

columns.title: RC_plus100
columns.dc:description: Rainbow curve plus 100 units

columns.title: RC_minus100
columns.dc:description: Rainbow curve minus 100 units

columns.title: Alt_rainbow
columns.dc:description: Alternative formula for the Rainbow Curve, not used

columns.title: US_gasoline_litre_usd
columns.dc:description: U.S. gasoline prices, in US dollars per litre

columns.title: US_gasoline_yoy_per
columns.dc:description: Percentage change in gasoline prices year-on-year

columns.title: Spain_gasoline_litre_usd
columns.dc:description: Spain gasoline prices, in US dollars per litre
